articles.description: Partners of hinterland Gaia Retreat and Spa looking for like-minded new owners...
articles.content: The property's co-owners include Gregg Cave, Ruth Kalnin, Olivia Newton-John and Warwick Evans. Colliers agent Karen Wales said they were wanted to hand the baton to a like-minded buyer who would con… [+947 chars]
